data.content: Now let us answer some questions to show what Bluie's story tells us.
Read the options given below. Click on Answer This to choose one of the following options.

content.name: What does the story tell us?
content.quesionTranscript: What does the story tell us?
content.modelAnsTranscript: Student A: Our earth is facing the danger of pollution. One day, we might lose all the greenery. The earth will become hot. Student B: We are facing pollution. We are not planting enough trees.We are cutting down trees and using too many chemicals in everything..
content.instructions:
• Listen to the model conversation below.
  • Discuss with your partner,choose a role and create a dialogue for the chosen option.
  • You can also use the words and phrases from the word cloud on your screen to create your dialogue.
  • After you have practised,click 'Record'.
  • If you want to hear your recording, click on the play button.
  • If you are happy with your recording, click on 'Save File'.

content.name: Why was Bluie sad?
content.quesionTranscript: Why was Bluie sad?
content.modelAnsTranscript: Student A:Bluie was sad because the earth was no longer blue and cool.Student B:Bluie was sad because there was nothing on earth and he had lost his magic.

content.name: Why did the earth turn red and hot?
content.quesionTranscript: Why did the earth turn red and hot?
content.modelAnsTranscript: Student A:The earth turned hot because there were no trees.</br>Student B : The earth turned hot because the people did not nurture the trees. They cut down trees and the earth became hot.
